formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: Setvar Synopsis: Set Channel Variable Privilege: call,all Description: Set a global or local channel variable. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) Channel: Channel to set variable for *Variable: Variable name *Value: Value
